column5: For those interested in shop to you drop.....LOL.....here's the scoop on the new limits to what you can return to the mother land in hand...  http://www.buffalonews.com/business/article877371.ece
Hey BB. Can I come and visit you for 49 hrs ????
That depends....will you be wearing pants....
Yes. I think they're necessary for crossing the border.
Last time I crossed the border I was wearing 18 pairs of pants, and 32 Tshirts... Funny how they only questioned me about the 4 pairs of shoes I was wearing
